member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:DocumentsService.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: T:Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Controllers.CacheController
member.summary: Used to return public items from the cache.

member.name: M:Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Controllers.CacheController.GetDocumentData(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the original document data as a stream; used primarily for loading a PDF Document's stream for use in client-side PDF Rendering/Text Extraction in Leadtools.Document.Viewer.
member.returns: A stream to the original document data.

member.name: M:Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Controllers.CacheController.Item(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a cache item. Generally this URI should be set up with authentication and accessed with POST to protect sensitive information. CreateConversionResultUri is the source of this URI for the client; conversion results are sent to the client with a relative URI to be accessed from here. This mainly acts as a simple map to the cache directory.

member.name: T:Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Controllers.DocumentController
member.summary: Used with the LEADDocument class of the LEADTOOLS Document JavaScript library.

member.name: M:Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Controllers.DocumentController.Decrypt(Leadtools.Services.Models.Document.DecryptRequest)
member.summary: Returns a decrypted version of the document when passed the correct password, or throws an exception.
member.param: A DecryptRequest containing an identifier and password.
member.returns: A DecryptResponse containing all new document information.

member.name: M:Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Controllers.DocumentController.Convert(Leadtools.Services.Models.Document.ConvertRequest)
member.summary: Runs the conversion specified by the conversion job data on the document, and stores the result to the cache.

member.name: M:Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Controllers.DocumentController.GetHistory(Leadtools.Services.Models.Document.GetHistoryRequest)
member.summary: Retrieves changes to the document since the history was last cleared.

member.name: T:Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Controllers.AnnotationsController
member.summary: Used for setting/getting annotations with external applications.

member.name: M:Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Controllers.AnnotationsController.SetAnnotationsIBM(Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Models.Annotations.SetAnnotationsIBMRequest)
member.summary: Sets IBM P8 annotations into the document.

member.name: M:Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Controllers.AnnotationsController.GetAnnotationsIBM(Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Models.Annotations.GetAnnotationsIBMRequest)
member.summary: Gets changed IBM P8 annotations from the document.

member.name: T:Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Controllers.FactoryController
member.summary: Used with the DocumentFactory class of the LEADTOOLS Document JavaScript library.

member.name: M:Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Controllers.FactoryController.LoadFromCache(Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Models.Factory.LoadFromCacheRequest)
member.summary: Loads the specified document from the cache, if possible. Errors if the document is not in the cache.

member.name: M:Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Controllers.FactoryController.LoadFromUri(Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Models.Factory.LoadFromUriRequest)
member.summary: Creates and stores an entry for the image at the URI, returning the appropriate Document data.

member.name: M:Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Controllers.FactoryController.BeginUpload(Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Models.Factory.BeginUploadRequest)
member.summary: Creates a link that a document can be uploaded to for storing in the cache. Meant to be used with UploadDocument.

member.name: M:Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Controllers.FactoryController.UploadDocument(Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Models.Factory.UploadDocumentRequest)
member.summary: Uploads a chunk of data to the specified URL in the cache.

member.name: M:Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Controllers.FactoryController.EndUpload(Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Models.Factory.EndUploadRequest)
member.summary: Optional - marks the end of uploading data for the specified URL in the cache. The service can execute commands to do additional processing with this fully-uploaded document.

member.name: M:Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Controllers.FactoryController.AbortUploadDocument(Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Models.Factory.AbortUploadDocumentRequest)
member.summary: Aborts the document upload.

member.name: M:Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Controllers.FactoryController.SaveToCache(Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Models.Factory.SaveToCacheRequest)
member.summary: Saves the specified document to the cache. If the document is not in the cache it will be created.

member.name: M:Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Controllers.FactoryController.Delete(Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Models.Factory.DeleteRequest)
member.summary: Deletes the document from the cache.

member.name: M:Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Controllers.FactoryController.PurgeCache(System.String)
member.summary: Purges the cache of all outdated items. Requires a passcode set on the service's configuration.

member.name: M:Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Controllers.FactoryController.GetCacheStatistics(System.String)
member.summary: Checks the policies of the cache items and returns statistics, without deleting expired items.

member.name: M:Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Controllers.FactoryController.PreCacheDocument(Leadtools.Services.Models.PreCache.PreCacheDocumentRequest)
member.summary: Adds the specified document to the cache with an unlimited expiration and all document data. Future calls to LoadFromUri may return this document (matched by URI).

member.name: M:Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Controllers.FactoryController.ReportPreCache(Leadtools.Services.Models.PreCache.ReportPreCacheRequest)
member.summary: Returns all the entries in the pre-cache.

member.name: M:Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Controllers.FactoryController.CheckCacheInfo(Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Models.Factory.CheckCacheInfoRequest)
member.summary: Checks that the mimetype for an uploaded document is acceptable to load.

member.name: M:Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Controllers.FactoryController.DownloadAnnotations(Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Models.Factory.DownloadAnnotationsRequest)
member.summary: Downloads the annotations of a document for external use. If no annotations exist, an empty XML file is returned.

member.name: M:Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Controllers.FactoryController.DownloadDocument(Leadtools.DocumentViewer.Models.Factory.DownloadDocumentRequest)
member.summary: Downloads a document (and possibly annotations) for external use.

member.summary: Used with the DocumentImages class of the LEADTOOLS Document JavaScript library.

member.summary: Retrieves thumbnails as a grid, instead of as individual images.

member.summary: Gets the page image as an SVG.

member.summary: Reads any barcodes that may exist on this page.

member.summary: Gets any annotations that may exist on this page.

member.summary: Should XML parsing errors be ignored?
